title: Add half test in test_nn for auto generated tests.
body_html:
• For NewModuleTest, it's straighforward to add half() and double() tests
  • For NewCriterionTest, I add test_cuda() in the class to override the one inherited from CriterionTest from common_nn.py, which is shared by legacy nn. I can merge it back to common_nn, with some more if/else to eliminate edge cases for legacy. Personally I think it's better to have it overrided so it's easier to add more tests in the future, but happy to discuss.

This is the last piece I have in mind for #4940 . Let me know if I'm missing some other tests that need half precision test. Thanks!
